abstract: Focusing on wealthy dog owners — “I got vans running up and down Fifth Avenue all day long” — is one strategy.
snippet: Focusing on wealthy dog owners — “I got vans running up and down Fifth Avenue all day long” — is one strategy.
lead_paragraph: The recession has not been kind to the pet industry. While their finances are in flux, pet owners are less likely to splurge on toys or grooming, and fewer vacations spell empty kennels at the boarding house. In fact, prospective owners are less likely to take on the financial burden of a new dog or cat to begin with.

headline.main: Pet Chauffeur Tries to Adapt to Tough Economy
